jobDescription: DeMartini & Walker LLP, a Real Estate Litigation and Estate Planning Firm, is seeking an experienced, motivated Paralegal to fill a part-time or full-time position with our firm’s Real Estate Litigation division.Must have at least two-years experience in the following areas: • Drafting and filing complaints, pleadings and motions. • Drafting written discovery requests/responses, summarizing depositions, records, etc., and document production. • Preparation of mediation and trial binders, exhibits, MILs, record review, and management. • Legal research. • Other office related activities including calendaring, internal case management and assisting attorneys in a legal and administrative capacity.  Must be a self-starter with strong organizational skills.  Both full and part-time applicants will be considered. Please provide resume. Writing Samples will be considered. Please do not contact our office directly by phone when replying to this post. Salary will be competitive and commensurate with experience and skills.
